extendedInfo.description: Little Fairy  is a Live Wallpaper.After you have downloaded and installed it,  You need in order to set it  as a Live Wallpaper:- go to your home screen;- press the menu button on your device;- select "Wallpaper";- select "Live Wallpapers";- search and select for this Live Wallpaper"- select "Settings" to see the settings or select "Set wallpaper" to activate it.System Requirement:any phone that came with Android OS 2.0 or later should work fine. Anything that came with 1.5 / 1.6 may have problemsTags:Little Fairy  Live wallpapers Sky Blue lake water nature green

reviews.title: little fairy wallpaper
reviews.comment: Beautiful but. . to small very dissapointed my cell the samsung galaxy note i717 is to big the screen as well as the htc one x. This wallpaper is made for older smaller versions cell phones with smaller screens.Other than that its  app free beauitful contrast,colors,scenery,thaks kristen..
reviews.author: Kristen Cates
